anathuruwa buddhagayawe thaththwaya samanaya kale indiyawe prathama janadhipathi rajendra prasad mathithuma path kala komitiye nirdesha anuwayi. 1949 di buddhagaya panatha magin mema sthanaya bauddhayan ge wandana mana sthanayak bawata path karalimata indiya rajaya ekanga wuwada ee sandaha palaka komitiyata hindunda athulath wiya yuthu yayi thiranaya wuni.ehidi wadi pirisak hindu samajikayan eyata athulath wiya.

engalanthaye kalakata pera usas adyapanaya dunne nomileya.namuth 1988 di pamana sulu mudalak gewime kramayak hadunwa di atha.eya kramayen wadi wi dan wasarakata pawum 9000ka simawe atha.meya ithama adu poliyakata gatha haki wuwath wasara pahaka patamalawak awasan wana wita samanya sisuwaku pawum 45000 pamana naya wi awasanaya.
